sentences.sentence: Thousands protest in Bosnia demanding a recount in the presidential election, as reports point to irregularities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Officials say road and rail traffic have partially resumed following Saturday's fiery explosion on a strategic Crimean bridge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The blast has provoked Russian President Vladimir Putin into holding a meeting of his National Security Council in the Kremlin today.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Putin has already described the incident on the key bridge which links occupied Crimea to the Russian mainland as a terrorist act.

sentences.sentence: There is no doubt that this is a terrorist act aimed at destroying the critical and important civilian infrastructure of the Russian Federation.

sentences.sentence: Это наглядное подтверждение слабости путинской армии, путинских спецслужб, путинского государства, путинского режимаа самого Путина и оппозицию это безусловно выдастся вела лоялистов это деморализовала то есть это поскольку это это еще раз они убеждаются в том что когда власти говорят что все идет по плану и мы побеждаем они врут train southeast, a search operation continued throughout the night. Hope has all but disappeared, finding anyone alive in the rubble following Russian missile strikes on several residential buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: At least 13 people are now known to have died, with as many as 90 more injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people in Bosnia took to the streets for the second time in a week alleging that a pro-russian bosnian serb leader had rigged a ballot during a general election earlier this month the opposition parties in republica srpska one of two entities of bosnia herzegovina say the candidate they backed helena trivik defeated longtime nationalist leader Milorad Dodik in the October second election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They are demanding a recount of the votes for president amid reports of dozens of election irregularities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In a speech, Trivik demanded judicial institutions to conduct investigations and criminal charges to be taken against all individuals who took part in organized election theft, for which she says they already provided evidence and that the public is aware of it all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: She added that thieves have altered the election will of the people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Dodic, who is the most powerful politician in the Bosnian Serbs semi-autonomous region, has denied allegations that he orchestrated an election fraud. He has ruled practically unchallenged for years despite being sanctioned by the West for advocating the separation of Republika Srpska from the rest of Bosnia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Final results of the October 2 vote in Bosnia are yet to be announced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen appears to have secured a second six-year term in office by winning a clear majority of votes and avoiding a run-off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to projections, the 78-year-old incumbent swept 54.6% of the votes, with six other candidates, all men, lagging far behind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's a bit difficult to explain, especially the journalists, that you do not only need a majority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Majority on the 9th of October means having more than all the others together. That's what it is.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Although the position is largely ceremonial, the former Greens leader had campaigned on a slogan of clarity and stability and had been billed as a safe pair of hands as the ripple effects of Russia's invasion of Ukraine push up inflation throughout Europe. It's great that it was possible already in the first round, although as a Green activist who likes to talk with people, I would not have been afraid of a second round.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It would have meant more time to talk to people and convince them of our ideas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There were seven contenders in Sunday's election, but Van der Bellen had the implicit or explicit backing of Austria's mainstream parties. The Freedom Party was the only one in parliament to field a candidate against him. The confirmed final result will only be announced after counting the absentee ballots later today. Psychologist Natalia doesn't get news about Ukrainian army moves from TV.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Like others, Iryna spoke to in the Mykolaiv region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Every day she follows anonymous first-hand reports on social media and knows personally Ukrainian soldiers on the front line, as well as the volunteers that are trying to help the civilians living on the territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: What is going on in Mykolaiv and and the Mikolaj region is a horror.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This is a real horror. What is going on in Kherson is unimaginable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's butcher. Number two.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The closer the Ukrainian soldiers are to house on the greater the chances of more civilians staying alive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Every other evening Natalia bakes and sends food to the front line to support Ukrainian soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The road to get there is hard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The one to Kherson, temporarily occupied by Russia, is way harder than it used to be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A drive that used to take one hour now takes volunteers six days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The medicine can also be confiscated by Russian army at checkpoints.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Countless villages in the south is standing ruins with their former inhabitants now displaced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Among them is Maria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Nothing is left of her family home in the Kherson region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Her husband was the last one evacuated six days after a rocket fell on his doorstep.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: My grandchildren. Children are such good people, all of them. The war has scattered us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: You all had to leave your village?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Yes, and our grandson went there and saved his grandfather to do that the young man walked alone into the village and a fire the mission appeared too risky even for any humanitarian organizations around a wide network of charities and volunteers support the army and those in most need.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Despite extreme fatigue, their devotion is remarkable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We know a lot of our soldiers taking back our land centimeter by centimeter and we are very grateful for it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are trying to do everything possible to bring victory closer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: For people in southern Ukraine, the advances of the Ukrainian armyuelan town of Las Tejerias, sweeping homes away and killing at least 25 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fifty-two others are missing after the banks of five small rivers burst following relentless rain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Over 1,000 rescuers are looking for victims under the debris. Heavy rains caused by the La Niña weather pattern is causing havoc in the region. La Niña is the term adopted for weather pattern that occurs in the Pacific Ocean. It's a naturally occurring weather system which involves a cooling of the Pacific Ocean and usually brings wetter conditions to Asia, Africa and Latin America.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Times are hard for Dutch fishermen, like those based here in Den Helder. According to an estimate by the Wageningen University, about 40 of the 75 large Dutch cutter companies fishing for sole and place will stop soon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's all becoming less and less viable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: While Dutch fishermen can continue to fish in British waters after Brexit, they get a progressively smaller share as the years go by.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Licensing has also become more laborious and costly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Wind farms and increasing closed-off sea areas have also added to the burden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Fishing areas where you have to earn your living, where you catch your soul and your place, you lose all that to closed-off areas, wind farms. It doesn't stop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Fishermen have been lured by a government compensation scheme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: If they set up in one and a half months, they will receive remuneration which could amount to several million euros per ship. This, combined with high fuel costs due to the war in Ukraine, have tipped many over the edge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Those nature reserves and wind farms at sea were already worrying the fishermen, but the last push they've had is the explosion in fuel prices. Fuel costs have doubled and they just can't bear it. That made them decide to make use of the buyout scheme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Many men have devoted their whole lives to this industry. Even with the buyout, as Yap says, they don't know what they'll be able to do next.
